name: Vampire's Castle
description:
Controls:

Your castle is under attack, you need to use your blood axe to kill enemies. If you blood will hit max limit you will win. You get blood for killing enemies with your axe.

W, Arrow Up - Up
A, Arrow Left - Left
S, Arrow Down - Down
D, Arrow Right - Right

Left Mouse Click - put blood axe as a trap

Escape - Go to main menu

It's honestly unfinished and unpolished I wanted to add so much more but I was out of time. I will probably will work more on project and release better version after. Thanks for checking anyway <3
